Lubbock.Sunset International Bible Institute: Sunset International Bible Institute is a Churches of Christ-affiliated institution of higher education in Lubbock, Texas. It was established in 1962 by Cline Rex Paden (1919–2007), a native of Hunt County, upon his return to Lubbock from an extended missionary trip to Italy. Originally called the Latin American Bible School, Sunset started with six students being trained as Spanish-speaking preachers.
